verses.name: Ezekiel 5:8
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I, even I, am against thee, and will execute judgments in the midst of thee in the sight of the nations.

verses.name: Ezekiel 5:9
verses.text: And I will do in thee that which I have not done, and whereunto I will not do any more the like, because of all thine abominations.

verses.name: Ezekiel 5:10
verses.text: Therefore the fathers shall eat the sons in the midst of thee, and the sons shall eat their fathers; and I will execute judgments in thee, and the whole remnant of thee will I scatter into all the winds.
